languages.text: "Вам стоит чаще выходить из своего бункера, губернатор Медина. Я прибыл{mf||а} в систему недавно и знаю о восстании гораздо больше вас".
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
languages.original_text: "Вам стоит чаще выходить из своего бункера, губернатор Медина. Я прибыл{mf||а} в систему недавно и знаю о восстании гораздо больше вас".

traits.locale_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."
"You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

languages.text: "Ihr solltet Euren Bunker häufiger verlassen, Gouverneur Medineh. Ich bin erst kürzlich in diesem System eingetroffen und weiß jetzt schon mehr über den Aufstand als Ihr."
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet Euren Bunker häufiger verlassen, Gouverneur Medineh. Ich bin erst kürzlich in diesem System eingetroffen und weiß jetzt schon mehr über den Aufstand als Ihr."

languages.text: « Vous devriez sortir plus souvent de votre bunker, gouverneur Medineh. Je viens d'arriver dans ce système, mais j'en sais déjà bien plus long que vous sur l'insurrection. »
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez sortir plus souvent de votre bunker, gouverneur Medineh. Je viens d'arriver dans ce système, mais j'en sais déjà bien plus long que vous sur l'insurrection. »

languages.text: “梅迪涅总督，你应该少在地堡里躲着，多出来看看。我才刚到这颗行星，就已经比你更了解这场叛乱是怎么回事了。”
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: “梅迪涅总督，你应该少在地堡里躲着，多出来看看。我才刚到这颗行星，就已经比你更了解这场叛乱是怎么回事了。”

languages.text: 「メディネ総督、もっと頻繁に地下の砦から出た方がいい。{mf|俺|私}は最近この星系に到着したばかりだが、すでに君より反乱について詳しいぞ」
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: 「メディネ総督、もっと頻繁に地下の砦から出た方がいい。{mf|俺|私}は最近この星系に到着したばかりだが、すでに君より反乱について詳しいぞ」

languages.text: «Debería salir de su búnker más a menudo, Gobernador Medineh. Acabo de llegar a este sistema y ya sé mucho más sobre la insurrección que usted».
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: «Debería salir de su búnker más a menudo, Gobernador Medineh. Acabo de llegar a este sistema y ya sé mucho más sobre la insurrección que usted

languages.text: "Sığınağınızdan dışarı daha sık çıkmalısınız Vali Medineh. Bu sisteme yeni ayak bastım ancak ayaklanma hakkında şimdiden sizden daha fazla bilgi sahibiyim."
languages.original_text: "You ought to leave your bunker more often, Governor Medineh. I have only recently arrived in this system and I already know much more about the uprising than you do."

traits.locale_text: "Sığınağınızdan dışarı daha sık çıkmalısınız Vali Medineh. Bu sisteme yeni ayak bastım ancak ayaklanma hakkında şimdiden sizden daha fazla bilgi sahibiyim."
